page.description: This dialog box demonstrates Freeform Radio buttons that use images instead of text. The B directive sets the style of the button, shading the background of the button when the mouse is over it. The T directive defines the bubble help text. The I directive defines the image to be displayed.

section.description: The value set by the button click is stored in layout_type and displayed in the text box.

see.ref: Reading Variables in External Modeless Xdialogs
